familyLetter.body:
Marlo,

The children are excited about your new position. Eli keeps telling his friends that his father catches criminals. I didn't correct him.

We believe in you. Come home safe.

— Lena

days.headline: COUNCIL APPROVES NEW SURVEILLANCE MEASURES
days.subheadline: Citizens urged to report pattern violations in their districts

familyLetter.body:
Marlo,

We're running low on a few things. The ration cards only stretch so far this month. Eli needs new shoes — he's growing so fast.

Don't work too late. The children miss you at dinner.

— Lena

caseOutcomeHeadlines.headlineIfSolved: PATTERN VIOLATION RESOLVED: LEDGER THIEF APPREHENDED
caseOutcomeHeadlines.headlineIfUnsolved: MISSING LEDGER CASE GROWS COLD — BUREAU UNDER SCRUTINY

days.headline: DISTRICT 7 CURFEW EXTENDED AFTER UNREST
days.subheadline: Council spokesperson: 'Order will be maintained at all costs'

familyLetter.body:
Marlo,

There was a disturbance in the market today. Soldiers everywhere. The children were frightened.

I told them everything is fine. Is everything fine?

Please be careful.

— Lena

unlockNotices: SPECTROGRAPH ACCESS GRANTED — Chemical analysis now available

caseOutcomeHeadlines.headlineIfSolved: SECOND PATTERN OFFENDER IDENTIFIED THROUGH BUREAU ANALYSIS
caseOutcomeHeadlines.headlineIfUnsolved: UNSOLVED CASES MOUNT AS BUREAU RESOURCES STRAINED
